Title: Inception
description: A thief who enters people's dreams to steal secrets must pull off his toughest mission yet: planting an idea in someone's subconscious.

Title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker discovers reality is a simulated world, and joins a rebellion to free humanity from its machine overlords.

Title: Interstellar
description: A group of astronauts embarks on a journey through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity as Earth faces extinction.

Title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to infiltrate a wealthy household, leading to unexpected and dark consequences.

Title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of a powerful crime family hands control to his reluctant son, sparking a violent struggle for power.

Title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine through a series of violent and darkly humorous events.

Title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest challenge yet as he battles the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

Title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a charismatic soap salesman, leading to an anarchic movement that challenges consumerism.

Title: Forrest Gump
description: Forrest Gump, a slow-witted but kind-hearted man, unwittingly influences several historical events while navigating life and love in America.

Title: Schindler's List
description: Oskar Schindler, a German businessman, saves the lives of over a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust by employing them in his factories
